original_title: Menendez brothers seek parole three decades after parents’ murders | Fox News
article_summary: "California Governor Gavin Newsom to decide on Menendez brothers' potential release from prison following their parole hearings this week, despite their 1989 murder convictions. The brothers, Erik and Lyle, were sentenced to life without parole but had their sentences reduced in 2021, making them eligible for parole."</s>
